thread.title: German prosecutors conduct searches in VW emissions probe
thread.title_full: German prosecutors conduct searches in VW emissions probe - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: German prosecutors conduct searches in VW emissions probe
text:
BERLIN (AP) - German prosecutors have carried out searches in connection with the Volkswagen diesel emissions scandal.
Prosecutors in Braunschweig say the raids were carried out Thursday in Wolfsburg, where VW has its headquarters, and at other locations.
In a statement, they said the aim of the searches was to "secure documents and data storage devices" that could identify those involved in the alleged manipulation and explain how it was carried out.
